name: Death Moto Furious Car Race
description:
Get ready to enter new deadly car shooting and racing arena simulator. New idea and new environment fast racing and driving game. On which have many action and simulation seen to fully entertain you. Fully weaponzed custom furious racing cars for death race car game. On this game have breathtaking challenging racing mission with death shooting scenario. Use your fast racing skill and destroy brutal enemy and clear you.

It is a nonstop car shooting game. On the way you have how many vehicles and helicopter you destroy in your mission. You need to dodge or destroy all the obstacles and vehicles, which are coming on your way. Shoot and earn the coins gold’s. Collect coins, nitro, and ammo and boost your monster car on the road or shoot all the vehicles and chopper, This game is for hardcore gamer who enjoy the top latest car shooting, racing, FPS, simulation games. Never before will you have found yourself being a real racing shooter. try to make high scores and become a real car fast speed race.

Futuristic Racing Rivals Features:
• An immersive shooter experience
• 3D Futuristic themed graphics
• Epic upgrades to modify your vehicle
• Console quality HD graphics
• Challenging missions
• Real sci fi Environment
